name: Umi's Friends Unity
description: What is the project about? Umi's Friends is a relaxing and tile-matching GameFi project. This game seeks to provide a simple way for Web2 users to enter the Web3 world conveniently. Regardless of age, whether or not you are a gamer, users can play Umi’s Friends game anytime, anywhere, and complete tasks in just 10 minutes a day! Players can collect their personal Umi (NFTs), and participate in different game modes and win various rewards. Umi's Friends is a relaxing and tile-matching GameFi project. Players can collect their personal Umi (NFTs), and participate in different game modes and win various rewards. What makes your project unique? History of your project. What’s next for your project?
